globalSettings.title: General Settings
globalSettings.pushDescription: Enable all push notifications from the app

matchSettings.title: Match
matchSettings.newMatchDescription: Receive notifications when you match with someone
matchSettings.newFriendDescription: Receive notifications when you become friends with someone
matchSettings.likesReceivedDescription: Receive notifications when someone likes you
matchSettings.friendRequestsReceivedDescription: Receive notifications when someone sends you a friend request
matchSettings.superLikesDescription: Receive notifications when you receive a super like

messageSettings.title: Messages
messageSettings.newMessageDescription: Receive notifications when you receive messages from matches

groupSettings.title: Groups
groupSettings.groupInvitesDescription: Receive notifications when you're invited to a new group
